name: AdditionalDeviceStatusButtonProvider
description: Defines a provider for additional device status buttons. TODO to be removed when DeviceStatusWidget is migrated to Angular
rawdescription:
Defines a provider for additional device status buttons.

methods.name: canShowButton
methods.rawdescription: Determines whether the button should be shown for a given device.
methods.description: Determines whether the button should be shown for a given device.

jsdoctags.comment: The device for which to determine button visibility.
A boolean value indicating whether the button should be displayed.

methods.name: getButtonInfo
methods.rawdescription: Provides the properties necessary to render the button.
methods.description: Provides the properties necessary to render the button.

jsdoctags.comment: An object containing the button's title, icon, label, click action and optionally a class.
